Stomach: During a meal, flatulence; afterwards lassitude taciturn and hot, pain in epigastrium, especially on breathing
Abdomen: Loose evacuations with much flatulency, especially left side with pulling in legs
Abundant and frequent emission of fetid flatus

details: Small warts on hands.Marked symptoms in intestinal tract. Pain in nape of neck. Paralytic weakness. Small warts on hands.
name: Ferrum magneticum
